entry.title: Eastbound
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightDraft

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,365Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Evan Buckley never saw it coming.Not the kiss.Not the silence that followed.And certainly not the storm that would change everything, just hours later.Eddie Díaz never saw it coming.Not the phone call.Not Christmas with his parents.And certainly not the way both would change everything. EASTBOUND is told in three parts that together form a single complete story.”Or…Buck and Eddie navigate loss, secrets, and challenges, stepping into their future together.

entry.title: The Good I’ll Do
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,801Chapters: 5/24Kudos: 54

Summary: “I leave in a week,” Eddie said quietly. “Minimum Five-month deployment.”The spoon clattered against the counter, the sharp sound cutting through the air. Buck’s jaw tightened, his eyes narrowing with something too tangled to be just anger. “Five months? You were supposed to be done in three. No more deployments…We were supposed to finally settle down. Put down some roots. Be on the same fucking continent for more than a few months at a time.”Or, They survived deployments and the kind of chaos only Buck could attract. Falling in love should’ve been the easy part. Now married and raising Christopher, they’ve finally built the family they once only dreamed about…except Eddie’s been deployed again, and long-distance is proving tougher than any mission.

entry.title: Are Friends Allowed To Do That?
entry.summary:
Author: isthatacatsherlock

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,401Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: “What do you mean you’re not circumcised?” It sounded different in Eddie’s brain than how it came out. Maybe he’d had too many beers on this guy’s night with Chimney, Ravi, and Buck. He wanted to sound cool, unaffected, but the way everyone was looking at him now told him that he actually sounded distressed. Buck’s cheeks were blushing pink, and Eddie couldn’t help but stare a bit at the birthmarks. He forced himself to look away while explaining himself.“I mean…you just don’t seem like the type.”“The type,” said Buck. “What’s ‘the type’?”“I don’t know. I just thought everyone got circumcised. Like it’s as American as apple pie.”“Not to my parents,” Buck said. “It had health risks, so my parents didn’t do it. Dunno. It’s not really so different.”“I mean, it’s kind of different,” said Chimney. “Nothing wrong with it, though.”“How did we get on the subject of Buck’s dick, again?” asked Ravi.“Buck’s fault, technically,” said Chimney. “The question was what’s something unique about yourself.”“And it’s true!”

entry.title: Where The Lavender Grows Wild
entry.summary:
Author: rose_quartz_queen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,631Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 31

Summary: "From his vantage point on the museum steps, Buck can see Eddie for a little longer than Eddie can see him, and he watches as Eddie scans the crowd. Buck’s heart flutters in his chest, feeling like it's going to explode. He can still go home, he thinks, he can still leave. If he turns around right now, Buck can go home before Eddie even knows he was there. He can pack up his locker at work and leave, just like he did in Pennsylvania and South America. "After a not-quite-unexpected kiss, Buck and Eddie finally begin their journey as more than friends. However, as the pair get to know each other in a new way, Buck must finally come to terms with and heal from the past he has worked so hard to bury.A slow-burn fic exploring what it means to fall in love and find happiness after trauma.

entry.title: You and me and my Silver Star
entry.summary:
Author: WickedSwan

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,248Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Life nowadays should be great, for Buck.His probationary period is over, Maddie’s in L.A, the 118 is starting to feel like a real family and dispatcher Eddie Diaz has swooped into his life like a light at the end of the tunnel.His voice is like a breath of fresh air, something new and exciting that has shaken Buck’s routine to the core. They’re not friends – he doesn’t even know what the guy looks like, for God’s sake – but he knows Eddie’s someone he can trust. He feels it in his blood.So, life should be great.If it weren’t for that smug, arrogant, conceited—If it weren’t for Silver Star, the new Superhero in town.

entry.title: The sky could fall on me (But you mean more to me)
entry.summary:
Author: WhisperingHope

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,470Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 118

Summary: Evan Buckley has the worst luck. He knows it. His team knows it. Maddie dealt with it his entire upbringing. It’s become a simple fact of life. The sky is blue, grass is green, and Evan Buckley has god-awful luck. If a crushed leg (due to toppled fire truck), a pulmonary embolism at the ripe age of 27, being caught in a tsunami with his best friend’s son, and an honest to god lightning strike weren’t enough proof of the matter, stepping on a bomb is all the confirmation he really didn’t need.Edmundo Diaz has faced far too much death in his lifetime to be afraid of it. In fact, he’s spent most of his life staring down the barrel of a gun, metaphorically and physically. Quite honestly, Santa Muerte himself could appear before Eddie’s very eyes and he would just count it as another Tuesday. So being in close proximity to a live explosive? Not even the worst thing he’s had to deal with in recent years. Really, not even the worst thing he's had to deal with this week. But his best friend standing on the trigger? Eddie’s never been afraid of death. Until he found himself standing between it and his best friend.

entry.title: let's be friends (then never speak again)
entry.summary:
Author: pairofraggedclaws

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,648Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: Then again, maybe Brian isn't free at all. Because here he is, standing in the coffee shop he didn’t stop going to, and thinking that maybe God played it easy on him because there was a subtler play in the field, and here it is; bases loaded, home run looks sure, and there’s the pitcher giving him the kind of smile that makes him nervous, makes him question it all. There's a voice he knows, somewhere across the room, a voice he first heard from the other side of the confessional. Eddie.

entry.title: Buck, Bothered, and Bisexual
entry.summary:
Author: 1dalso

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,256Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 27

Summary: It’s as if time slows down, or the world comes to an abrupt halt.Not only is this guy probably the same age as Buck, but fuck. This might just be the hottest guy he’s ever seen— and he likes girls."Phew! That’s one fine man,” whistles Hen from the kitchen, sidling up besides Chimney, “And I like girls.”Buck eagerly nods in agreement, because who’s he kidding, he likes girls too. But hey, attraction is each to their own, and he finds whatever this is, quite attractive.He can unpack that later. Preferably at home. Maybe with a beer. Or two.—Buck and Eddie meet for the first time on the cusp of Buck's bisexual awakening. How much of the newbie, Eddie Diaz, can Buck handle before he takes matters into his own hands... and maybe gives those matters a kiss on the mouth?

entry.title: Between his hands - Part. 5 - Possession
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,659Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 30

Summary: Where Buck and Eddie learn that giving up isn't synonymous with weakness.Eddie finally opens up, and Buck welcomes him cautiously. He’s already been hurt too much, and there’s no way he’s going to let Eddie hurt him again. Their balance is fragile but is heading toward a calmer relationship.Everything starts to shake again when Abby shows up, determined to win Buck back. Eddie is torn between jealousy, anger, and fear. Their relationship gets tense... but neither of them is willing to give up. For the first time, they really try to understand each other.When a hidden box reveals Eddie’s true intentions, a whole new language takes over: one of offered submission, absolute trust, and chosen possession.What if loving each other also meant choosing to fully give yourself?I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)
